lbstproj 0.1.0

Global options for the lbstproj package

lbstproj-options.Rd

Global options for the lbstproj package

Global options for printing messages

  • options(save.print = TRUE) (default): print messages when saving figures and tables.

  • options(export.print = TRUE) (default): print messages when exporting figures and tables.

  • options(use.print = TRUE) (default): print messages when creating a new R script.

Developed by Alexandre Bohyn.

Site built with pkgdown 2.2.0.
